steps.title: Find a player to trade with.
steps.content: Find a player to trade with. Unlike other Pokémon that evolve by leveling up or using stones, Boldore only evolves when it gets traded to other players. Find a player either in your local area or online that you can trade Pokémon with.

steps.title: Go inside a Union Room.
steps.content: Go inside a Union Room. This is where you'll meet the player your trading with.

steps.title: Trade Boldore to the other player.
steps.content: Trade Boldore to the other player. Once the other player receives it, Boldore will evolve to Gigalith.

steps.title: Begin another trading sequence.
steps.content: Begin another trading sequence. You will need to do this to get Gigalith back. To shorten the process, you can look for a player who's willing to let go of a Boldore. Once you get their Boldore, it will evolve to Gigalith. [1] X Research source
